page.title: 18PARENT'S EVENING Class Two
page.content: Burton parish council. Burton Parochial Church:- council, adult Bible class,boys bible class,girls bible class,choir,bell ringers,Sunday school ,Boys brigade. Mothers union,Burton Morewood School managers,Burton in kendal Educational Foundation. W.V.R.S.(meals on wheels). Conservation assoication, Burton & Holme british Legion (womens section) & Milnthorpe Show Committee, Holme Industries section. Farmers Discusion Group. Burton Memorial hall committee old tyne dancing. Childrens dancing Classes,embroidery, patchwork,upholstery, keep fit, W.E.A. Industrial Archaeology Classes, child welare clinic,
